title: "Robots help farmers say goodbye to repetitive tasks"
excerpt: "We do not often think about the labor that goes into bringing our favorite fruits and vegetables to our table. For farmers, growing healthy crops involves repetitive tasks such as weeding and spraying while the crop is growing."
